db:abstract.db:para: Provides classes and functions for using some Windows APIs in a Qt way.

db:article.db:para: Provides classes and functions for using some Windows APIs in a Qt way.

db:listitem.db:para: The QtWin namespace contains miscellaneous Windows-specific functions.
The QWinJumpList class represents a transparent wrapper around Windows Jump Lists.
The QWinJumpListCategory class represents a jump list category.
The QWinJumpListItem class represents a jump list item.
The QWinMime class maps open-standard MIME to Window Clipboard formats.
The QWinTaskbarButton class represents the Windows taskbar button for a top-level window (Windows 7 and newer).
The QWinTaskbarProgress class represents a progress indicator in the Windows taskbar.
The QWinThumbnailToolBar class allows manipulating the thumbnail toolbar of a window.
The QWinThumbnailToolButton class represents a button in a thumbnail toolbar.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QtWin namespace contains Windows-specific functions for type conversions and DWM glass frame manipulation.
The classes enable you to use features introduced with Windows 7, such as Jump Lists, a progress indicator on a taskbar button, or a thumbnail toolbar.
